metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36314 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
When opening a Windows shortcut from the local filesystem, an attackercould supply a remote path that would lead to unexpected network requestsfrom the operating system.
This bug only affects Firefox for Windows.Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox < 103, and Thunderbird < 102.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
